p: The 2002 epidemic reflected the introduction of the DENV-3 serotype in the country. The introduction and predominance of DENV-3 marks the increase in the occurrence of severe forms in the disease. The 2008 epidemic was associated with recirculation and predominance of DENV-2, and the main change observed in the epidemiology of the disease during this period was the increase in severe cases in children. In the 2010 epidemic, the DENV-1 serotype predominated and the main change in epidemiology was the increase in the mortality rate of the disease [ 35]. From this year the autochthonous transmission of serotype DEN-4 began in the country.
